SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT020
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is used to request a copy of one or more GPA or FIN messages previously sent or received. Both the message text and its associated input and delivery history are returned in an MT 021 Retrieved Message (Text and History). Messages can be specified for retrieval by a combination of various criteria.
The maximum retrieval period for live messages is 124 days from the date of input to the system. For Test & Training messages the period is 4 days.
From: User To: GPA or FIN

SystemField.Name: swift-address
SystemField.description: Logical terminal to which the retrieved copy should be delivered.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: swift-address
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Complete 12-character address, including LT code and branch code, or default branch code XXX.

SystemField.Name: mir
SystemField.description:
MIR of the individual message that is to be retrieved. It consists of:
a) Date of input of the message
b) Sending LT and branch code XXX (irrespective of the branch code used in the original message)
c) Session number
d) ISN

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: mir
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
MIR of the individual message that is to be retrieved. It consists of:
a) Date of input of the message
b) Sending LT and branch code XXX (irrespective of the branch code used in the original message)
c) Session number
d) ISN

SystemField.Name: mir-range
SystemField.description:
Range of MIRs for retrieval. The MIRs consist of:
a) Date of input of the message
b) Sending LT and branch code XXX (irrespective of which branch code was used in the original message)
c) Session number
d) ISN
This information must be repeated once for the first message input reference in the range and once for the last.
An optional time range criterion can be specified.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: mir-range
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Range of MIRs for retrieval. The MIRs consist of:
a) Date of input of the message
b) Sending LT and branch code XXX (irrespective of which branch code was used in the original message)
c) Session number
d) ISN
An optional time range criterion can be specified.

SystemField.Name: mor
SystemField.description:
MOR of the individual message that is to be retrieved. It consists of:
a) Date of output of the message
b) Receiving LT and branch code XXX (irrespective of the branch code used in the original message)
c) Session number
d) OSN

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: mor
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
MOR of the individual message that is to be retrieved. It consists of:
a) Date of output of the message
b) Receiving LT and branch code XXX (irrespective of the branch code used in the original message)
c) Session number
d) OSN

SystemField.Name: mor-range
SystemField.description:
Range of MORs for retrieval. The MORs consist of:
a) Date of output of the message
b) Receiving LT and branch code XXX (irrespective of which branch code was used in the original message)
c) Session number
d) OSN This information must be repeated once for the first message output reference in the range and once for the last.
An optional time range criterion can be specified.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: mor-range
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Range of MORs for retrieval. The MORs consist of:
a) Date of output of the message
b) Receiving LT and branch code XXX (irrespective of which branch code was used in the original message)
c) Session number
d) OSN
An optional time range criterion can be specified.

SystemField.Name: msg-input-type
SystemField.description:
Message input type, containing:
a) Input LT including branch code XXX
b) Input session
c) Message type
d) Input date
e) Input time range

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: msg-input-type

Message input type, containing:

SystemField.Name: 1st-isn
SystemField.description: First ISN to be retrieved in a multiple input message retrieval.

SystemField.Name: mur
SystemField.description: Message user reference assigned by the sender of a message. Contains one of the following: 1.Message User Reference as used in the header of the original message if present. 2.Contents of field 20 of the original message, if the message user reference was not present, 3.Contents of field 20C, with the codeword SEME and the number (only for category 5 messages). Tag 108 with only blanks (spaces) is accepted by the system.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: mur
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Message User Reference as used in the header of the original message

fieldvalidation.name: E1
fieldvalidation.comment: Only ONE of the fields or field groups should be present.
fieldvalidation.formula: (mir.$size + mir_range.$size + mor.$size + mor_range.$size + Group255.$size + Group257.$size + Group258.$size + Group260.$size + Group256.$size + Group259.$size + Group263.$size + Group264.$size)==1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Only ONE of the fields or field groups should be present."

fieldvalidation.name: E2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The 'mir', 'mor', and 'swift-address' used in the retrieval criteria must contain the branch-code XXX."
